title: Blowgun
summaries: The Blowgun is a pre-Hardmode ranged weapon, a stronger version of the Blowpipe, and is purchased from the Witch Doctor for 5. It looks similar to the Blowpipe, but has a red ribbon on the top and is flared on one end, and is used by the Witch Doctor to defend himself.

It can shoot <linked>Seeds</linked>, <linked>Poison Darts</linked>, <linked>Cursed Darts</linked>, <linked>Ichor Darts</linked> and <linked>Crystal Darts</linked>. Carrying a Blowgun in the <linked>inventory</linked> causes any vegetation growing on normal <linked>grass</linked> blocks to occasionally yield some Seeds when destroyed. Flowers growing in <linked>Clay Pots</linked> and <linked>Planter Boxes</linked> can also yield Seeds. Both wild and cultivated flowers typically drop 4 Seeds at a time. Long grass typically drops 1-2 Seeds.

statistics.Damage: 27 / 25 (Ranged)
statistics.Tooltip: Allows the collection of seeds for ammo
